problem.markdown:
1. Which of the following is not a perfect straight line mechanism?
() Peaucellier () Hart (x) Watt () None of these
2. The link in a Peaucellier mechanism is ?
(x) Binary link () Ternary link () Flexible link () None of these 3. How many different link lengths are there in a Peaucellier Mechanism?
() 6 () 4 (x) 3 () None of these
4. Which of the following geometric figures is there in a Peaucellier Mechanism
() None of these (x) Rhombus () Trapezoid () Square
problem.p: 1. Which of the following is not a perfect straight line mechanism?
2. The link in a Peaucellier mechanism is ?
3. How many different link lengths are there in a Peaucellier Mechanism?
